languages.text: "Обладатель истинной веры никогда бы не спрятался и не сдал свой храм врагу".
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
languages.original_text: "Обладатель истинной веры никогда бы не спрятался и не сдал свой храм врагу".

traits.locale_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."
"A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

languages.text: "Ein wahrer Gläubiger hätte sich niemals versteckt und dem Feind gestattet, seinen Tempel zu übernehmen."
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: "Ein wahrer Gläubiger hätte sich niemals versteckt und dem Feind gestattet, seinen Tempel zu übernehmen."

languages.text: « Un véritable disciple de la foi ne se serait jamais caché pour laisser l'ennemi s'emparer de son temple. »
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: « Un véritable disciple de la foi ne se serait jamais caché pour laisser l'ennemi s'emparer de son temple. »

languages.text: “真正的虔信之人绝不会躲起来，任由敌人占领他们的圣殿。”
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: “真正的虔信之人绝不会躲起来，任由敌人占领他们的圣殿。”

languages.text: 「真の信仰者ならば、身を隠して神殿を乗っ取られるようなことは決してしない」
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: 「真の信仰者ならば、身を隠して神殿を乗っ取られるようなことは決してしない」

languages.text: «Una verdadera persona de fe nunca se habría escondido y dejado que el enemigo se apoderara de su templo».
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: «Una verdadera persona de fe nunca se habría escondido y dejado que el enemigo se apoderara de su templo».

languages.text: "Gerçekten inançlı birisi, saklanıp da tapınağını düşmanın eline teslim etmez."
languages.original_text: "A true person of faith would never have hidden and let the enemy take over their temple."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten inançlı birisi, saklanıp düşmanının tapınağını ele geçirmesine asla izin vermezdi."
